pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## GalenThe name of the project comes from League of Legends.Now galen is a common tool library ## Installation```shellpip install galen```## Examples### Cookie tools```pythonfrom galen.spider.cookies import format_cookiescookies = 'aliyungf_tc=AQAAAOgxCHX0LwkAkKfqerDgQpnJBr44; csrfToken=LrCpyhAqhvA9d-R2PKLn84TG;'print(format_cookies(cookies))```## Changelogs| version | release notes || :--- | :--- || 0.1.4 | add core module || 0.1.3 | add example || 0.1.2 | add markdown || 0.1.1 | project init cookie split function |
